draw::IconAttr Class Reference

Documentation

This class defines the attributes of a Gfx object.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

Icon rotation orientations

Enumerator
RIGHT 

Point to the right.

DOWN 

Point down.

LEFT 

Point to the left.

UP 

Point up.

QUARTER_CLOCKWISE 

Add/subtract to/from RIGHT, DOWN, etc.

QUARTER_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE 

Add/subtract to/from RIGHT, DOWN, etc.

EIGHTH_CLOCKWISE 

Add/subtract to/from RIGHT, DOWN, etc.

EIGHTH_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE 

Add/subtract to/from RIGHT, DOWN, etc.
